title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 201-1.14 - Certificates to operate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 201-1.14 - Certificates to operate

State Regulations

The owner or operator of an existing facility operating
under a certificate to operate and/or permit to construct is required to apply
to the department f or a registration or permit, as described in this Part, with in 9 0 days of receiving written notification from the
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
201-1.14

Amended

New

York State Register February 10, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/24/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
